channel.title: Comments on: Zoe and Alex – The Pink Day Interview
channel.description: A Year Off With Our Kids

item.title: By: topheim
item.dc:creator: topheim
item.description:
In reply to <a href="https://projectpinkday.com/2015/07/22/zoe-and-alex-the-pink-day-interview/comment-page-1/#comment-97">artistseyes</a>.
My fav answer too! Not sure our Mondelez friends would forgive us for going to Nestle! ;-)
item.content:encoded:
In reply to artistseyes.

item.title: By: topheim
item.dc:creator: topheim
item.description:
In reply to <a href="https://projectpinkday.com/2015/07/22/zoe-and-alex-the-pink-day-interview/comment-page-1/#comment-96">Lynda Beam</a>.
Who knew, right?! We are now using special shampoo to keep it from going from blonde to green! Hope all is well!
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Lynda Beam.

Who knew, right?! We are now using special shampoo to keep it from going from blonde to green! Hope all is well!

LikeLike

item.title: By: artistseyes
item.dc:creator: artistseyes
item.description:
Hi guys, I particularly like daddy's occupation!
Next job...reach out to Kate, she is the head of talent for Nespresso....Nestle is in Switzerland, maybe Zoe would get her wish.
item.content:encoded:
Hi guys, I particularly like daddy’s occupation!

Next job…reach out to Kate, she is the head of talent for Nespresso….Nestle is in Switzerland, maybe Zoe would get her wish.

LikeLiked by 1 person

item.title: By: Lynda Beam
item.dc:creator: Lynda Beam
item.description: I cannot believe how blonde they are ... all those chemicals I used over the years and all I had to do was move to the beach? Miss you guys!
item.content:encoded:
I cannot believe how blonde they are … all those chemicals I used over the years and all I had to do was move to the beach? Miss you guys!

LikeLiked by 1 person
